analysis.key_quote: The proposed regulation would erode this foundation by enabling the reclassification of thousands of career civil servants into at-will positions based not on merit or performance, but on loosely defined criteria such as 'policy advocacy' or 'loyalty.'
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed regulation, highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based principles and the potential politicization of the civil service, which contradicts the values of nonpartisan governance and institutional integrity.
